Introduction
This topic contains information regarding the identification and processing of informal claims prior to March 24, 2015, including
characteristics of an informal claim﻿﻿﻿﻿
why informal claims were important
required elements of an informal claim
original claims not filed on the prescribed form before March 24, 2015
, and
claims made by telephone before March 24, 2015
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section H - Historical Guidance on Formal Applications and Informal Claims Received Prior to March 24, 2015
citation: Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section H
